name: Yung-Hsiang Lu
content: Yung-Hsiang Lu - Elmore Family School of Electrical and Computer Engineering - Purdue University Yung-Hsiang Lu Professor Of Electrical And Computer Eng Campus: West Lafayette Office: MSEE 222 Office Phone: +1 765-494-2668 E-mail: yunglu@purdue.edu Webpage: http://www.ece.purdue.edu/~yunglu/index.html Address Purdue University Elmore Family School of Electrical and Computer Engineering Materials and Electrical Engineering Building 501 Northwestern Ave. West Lafayette, Indiana 47907-2035 Degrees BSEE, National Taiwan University, 1992 MSEE, Stanford University, 1996 PhD, Stanford University, 2002 Research Mobile and cloud computing, energy-efficient computing, image and video processing Areas of Interest Computer Engineering VLSI and Circuit Design Indicates primary area for this faculty member. Note that a few faculty members have more than one primary area.
